casebody.data:
Luis GALARZA
v.
COMMISSIONER OF CORRECTION Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided May 17, 2017

James E. Mortimer, assigned counsel, in support of the petition.

*233C. Robert Satti, Jr., supervisory assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The petitioner Luis Galarza's petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 172 Conn.App. 902, 157 A.3d 1224 (2017), is denied.
